 java.lang.String replace(java.util.List<JPackerPattern> patterns, java.util.regex.Matcher matcher)

Method Detail

replace

java.lang.String replace(java.util.List<JPackerPattern> patterns,
                         java.util.regex.Matcher matcher)
Replacement function. Called once for each match found

Parameters:
patterns - A List that contains all JPackerPattern objects that wrap expressions to be evaluated
matcher - A Matcher object that corresponds to a match in the script
